title: News Briefs 02-09-2021
cleaned_text:
Instead of saying there’s ‘f#$%ery afoot’ he can now say there’s ‘f#$%ery ahoof’.
• Kenya says black rhino, sable antelope and other species are at risk from growing human population.
• At last the jackalope will be honored in coin form.
• The mysterious death of Elisa Lam at the Cecil Hotel.
• Welcome to the age of the new Puritans.
• Climate change is already being felt in the American West –among MANY other places…
• Global warming may put an end to the El Niño/La Niña temperature cycle.
• Celebrated Fortean writer Skylaire Alfvegren died suddenly. To commemorate her, here’s a kickass interview she recorded with Greg Bishop for Radio Misterioso.
• RFK assassin –and suspect Manchurian candidate– Sirhan Sirhan may be granted parole soon.
• Al Batt: Do UFOs believe in you?
• Countless COVID-19 antivaxxers and conspiracy theorists are dropping like flies. If only we could find out why…
• Red Pill of the Day: woman arrested after found with counterfeit vaccine card in Hawaii. Pro-tip for shady antivaxxers —LEARN HOW TO F#$%ING SPELL.

Quote of the Day:

Reality is not always probable, or likely.
